locations: New York City, New York, USA
Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA::(interiors)
imdb.plot outline: The story starts off with 3 friends, Litus, Zilo & Maria. At the start of the story its Litus 21st birthday and he doesn't want to go out. Zilo, his best friend sets a long awaited plan into motion with Maria, his girlfriend. Down and out because his ex-girlfriend not testing him for his birthday & because of a bad break up they had. Taking his best friends advice he goes out and celebrates with friends, friends he can call family, Litus even meets a girl that night and the both of them hit it off pretty well.
imdb.title: Litus & Eve
plot: The story starts off with 3 friends, Litus, Zilo & Maria. At the start of the story its Litus 21st birthday and he doesn't want to go out. Zilo, his best friend sets a long awaited plan into motion with Maria, his girlfriend. Down and out because his ex-girlfriend not testing him for his birthday & because of a bad break up they had. Taking his best friends advice he goes out and celebrates with friends, friends he can call family, Litus even meets a girl that night and the both of them hit it off pretty well.::Jose A. Colon
